changeSet.author: dchettupuzha
changeSet.comment: Insert new QC types for MLPA
changeSet.sql: insert into `prodlims`.`qc_type` (`category`, `description`, `name`, `ismultisample`) values ('SAMPLE', 'Floating peaks', 'FLOATING_PEAKS', 0), ('SAMPLE', 'Ladder Pullup Ratio', 'LADDER_PULLUP_RATIO', 0), ('SAMPLE', 'Data Channel Max RFU Low', 'MAX_DATA_HEIGHT_LOW', 0), ('SAMPLE', 'Data Channel Max RFU High', 'MAX_DATA_HEIGHT_HIGH', 0), ('SAMPLE', 'Median Q Fragment to Control Ratio', 'MEDIAN_Q_FRAGMENT_TO_CONTROL_RATIO', 0);

changeSet.author: dchettupuzha
changeSet.comment: Insert new QC stats types for MLPA
changeSet.sql: insert into `prodlims`.`qc_statistics_type` (`description`, `name`, `applicability`) values ('Floating peaks', 'FLOATING_PEAKS', 'ALL'), ('Ladder Pullup Ratio', 'LADDER_PULLUP_RATIO', 'ALL'), ('Data Channel Max RFU Low', 'MAX_DATA_HEIGHT_LOW', 'ALL'), ('Data Channel Max RFU High', 'MAX_DATA_HEIGHT_HIGH', 'ALL'), ('Median Q Fragment to Control Ratio', 'MEDIAN_Q_FRAGMENT_TO_CONTROL_RATIO', 'ALL');
